short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture, organize, and pin your thoughts and ideas with a sleek, intuitive interface designed for productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TallyNote is your ultimate note-taking companion, transforming how you capture and organize your ideas. With a user-friendly interface and powerful features, TallyNote lets you create, pin, and manage notes effortlessly. Quickly find your notes with robust search options, and enjoy seamless integration with your browser. Whether you're brainstorming, planning, or jotting down quick reminders, TallyNote keeps your thoughts organized and accessible, boosting your productivity.
